subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador extended his lead in the Vuelta a España, edging Levi Leipheimer by two seconds to win the 14th stage in Fuentes de Invierno. Contador leads Leipheimer by 1 minute 17 seconds over all.
snippet: Alberto Contador extended his lead in the Vuelta a España, edging Levi Leipheimer by two seconds to win the 14th stage in Fuentes de Invierno. Contador leads Leipheimer by 1 minute 17 seconds over all.
